Questions: What are the brokerage charges of Zerodha?
Answers:
Hey, Zerodha has flat brokerage charges for all type of instruments, i.e., Rs 20 per executed order or .03% whichever is lower.

Here are the Zerodha Brokerage charges for your reference:

Equity Delivery - Rs 0 (Free)

Equity Intraday - Rs 20 per executed order or .03% whichever is lower

Equity Futures - Rs 20 per executed order or .03% whichever is lower

Equity Options - Rs 20 per executed order

Currency Futures - Rs 20 per executed order or .03% whichever is lower

Currency Options - Rs 20 per executed order

Commodity Futures - Rs 20 per executed order or .03% whichever is lower

Commodity Options - Rs 20 per executed order

Hope this will help. You can aslo use Zerodha Brokerage calculator to compute the brokerage charges.

Thank you

Questions: What are the brokerage charges of Zerodha?
Answers:
Brokerage charges are different for different types of trades.for delivery trade nearly 20 rs is asked for a single trade.Tgis single trade can involve one or more share trade at one time.

For intraday flat 20 rs is incurred on one trade and for F and O brokerage is flat 20rs for buying and 20 rs for selling.

You can type on Google Zerodha charges calculator and fill your buying and selling information and It will show you the charges required.

Questions: What are the brokerage charges of Zerodha?
Answers:
Free equity delivery

All equity delivery investments (NSE, BSE), are absolutely free — ₹ 0 brokerage.

Intraday and F&O trades

Flat ₹ 20 or 0.03% (whichever is lower) per executed order on intraday trades across equity, currency, and commodity trades. Flat ₹20 on all option trades.

Free direct MF

All direct mutual fund investments are absolutely free — ₹ 0 commissions & DP charges.

Questions: How did Exnova reviews help you out with your process of choosing a broker?
Answers:
It's a long story for me. So better fasten your seat belts.

It's nice to be in the pursuit of new and challenging opportunities, whether it is a new market or an asset type that you are not expert on, or a new broker that could give you better perspectives, education or features that you could easily draw on in your favor on global financial markets.

I did not know about Exnova back then, and when I finally heard about it for the first time, I decided to research the company, and my process obviously included reading a lot of Exnova reviews as well.

As far as the reviews go, the company was all fine with decent trading conditions, preferable ecosystem, reliability, transparent regulatory situation, quick to deposit and withdraw, easy to use and get accustomed to, dynamic and exciting.

But I did not dive straight in, I took things a bit slow, analyzed the company a bit further, its features, its website, what people say about it. Then I registered for a demo account and instantly got $10,000 in virtual currency to completely try out the demo account. It was quite a good experience, the platform worked well and experienced my trades flawlessly, found the assets I liked to trade and know about. So I went over the features, and I was ready enough to try the platform with my own real money at stake.

When you first start looking at any platform, you usually would like to see what the broker has to offer to its traders. I found free tutorials in video form, instructions on how to use the platform thoroughly step-by-step, a lot of charts, visualizations and great looking charts to help me out.

So I started trading here with the input I gathered about the broker and the trading experience of other people in my mind. And people shared their experience about pretty much every aspect of the broker there is. Starting from how the platform is powerful and glitch-free even the most volatile times in the market, how fair the trading conditions are, how the interface is clear, how the choice of assets are a handful and there are more than enough stocks and crypto assets you could easily enjoy trading, and how abundant the educational resources are.

Well, after carefully reviewing the reviews themselves, and cross-checking what's been said about the broker on the platform first hand. I can enthusiastically confirm that majority of those points are on-point and accurate.

This is why you should always try to have a first-hand approach and experience in the first place after reading tons of reviews. You should confirm them for yourself, to see if this broker can be long-term for you.

So, a couple of major points for me was:

The broker fully complies with the modern regulatory protocols that are put in place to protect the investors, traders and end clients of brokers from any misbehaving of the broker. This one fully abides by it. So, you can bet your bottom dollar that your funds and hard earned money will be safe in your accounts here.

It was evident to me, that Exnova team put a great deal of time and effort into their trading platform to have it work without any problems, glitches, lags, slowdowns. The platform basically works like a clock even when the volatility goes up massively during big and significant macroeconomic announcements, during the US market open and close. This was a really important issue for me, and the broker ticked this box in a positive way.

In terms of the additional features that contribute to the reason why I chose this broker besides their reputation in the reviews and why I am thinking of keeping my account here, some of them would be:

- The community here is quite large. And the broker allows it to use the community and their actions in your favor. You can utilize the live chat, there is an option for traders' sentiment on the platform, so you can see where people are betting their money on, and you can display community live deals, so you can literally see the money in action, flowing.

- I can say that broker could be ideal for beginners who are just trying things out and low budget traders who do not have a lot of money to put in every single order. The minimum deal size starts at one dollar. Which can be a huge positive for those kind of traders.

- Other smart features of the trading platform include price movement alerts, the smart newsfeed and the properly designed economic calendar, which, if you know what you are doing, you can use it in your favor greatly.

All in all, apart from what's been said about the broker in the reviews, which, help traders a lot to realize what the broker has to offer to its traders,, all positive features I put a good emphasize on above also help people to gain a good understanding of how proper and reliable this broker is.

This has been an exciting journey overall to discover this broker, even though I haven't been able to get a full grip on what's on the table, I am sure with enough time and usage, I will get the full comprehension of the complete spectrum of features this broker can offer to me. But, coming back to your question, in terms of if and how the reviews helped me: they definitely help you with a lot of things that you would not normally discover this broker. So, it can be said, that reading reviews about a broker before and while you are doing business on the platform can be really helpful.

I hope I could actually answer your question in a satisfactory way.

Questions: What was said in an aaafx review that influenced your choice when choosing a platform to trade on with the broker?
Answers:
I have been using the AAAFx broker for quite some time, and I have quite a lot to say about the platforms here. I am naturally an inquisitive person, and reading reviews is one of the methods I use to satisfy my inquisitive nature. I also read FAQs and anything that I can lay my hands on.

So, AAAFx is a popular broker that offers quite the number of trading platforms to its clients. The broker's selection of platforms includes ZuluTrade, MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, and ActTrader. Each platform has its own unique features and benefits, making it a difficult task for clients to choose a platform to trade with. You can check out the platform comparison here
. That is why it is important for traders to consider their individual needs and preferences when choosing a platform.

One of the most critical factors to consider when choosing a trading platform is the platform's features. Each platform available at AAAFx offers a variety of features, such as the ability to use automated trading strategies or access to a broad range of technical indicators. For example, ZuluTrade provides traders with the ability to copy the trades of successful traders, while MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5 offer a wide range of customizable indicators and trading tools. It's crucial to consider what features are most important to you, as this can significantly impact your overall trading experience.

Another essential factor is user experience. You want a platform that is easy to navigate and provides you with all the information you need to make informed trading decisions. A platform that is difficult to use or lacks important features can be frustrating and make it more difficult for you to achieve your financial goals. Luckily, all the platforms have received praise from users for being easy to use and navigate, with simple and intuitive interfaces.

Security is also a critical factor to consider when choosing a trading platform. You want to be sure that your personal and financial information is protected at all times, and that the platform has a strong track record for security. AAAFx uses advanced encryption technologies to protect user data, and the platform has a solid reputation for providing its users with a secure trading environment. Questions: Will a stock broker make me money?
Answers:
Since nearly half of the people in the United States don't have any money in the stock market, we need to get the word out about the different ways people can invest. Most people learn about stocks from brokers, who tell them that they could make a lot of money if they invest.

A stockbroker can help you get rich, but that's not their main goal. Since they get paid per transaction, it's in their best interest to get you to sell and buy quickly so they can make the most money. But the best way to get rich is to buy and keep something for a long time.

You can trade US stocks by using the popular broker analyst 𝖵𝗂𝖼𝗍𝗈𝗋𝗂𝖺 𝖦𝗋𝖺𝖼𝖾 𝖫𝗂𝗇𝖽𝗌𝖺𝗒.

Here are the steps and requirements to begin trading stocks and profiting with the assistance of this broker:

Diversification is the key to achieving a balanced risk profile when investing.

Consider this easy illustration: if you invest your entire portfolio in one or two stocks and these companies collapse, you will likely lose your entire investment. To limit risk, you should invest in a diverse portfolio of 20 to 30 equities. You can diversify your portfolio by investing in multiple asset classes, such as bonds, currencies, and REITs, as opposed to investing solely in stocks. Consider utilising a Broker to assist you in managing your assets.

Step 1

Examine your eligibility

To begin trading investment products, you must be at least 18 years old and have been freed from bankruptcy. Determine the minimal amount of capital with which you are willing to start investing.

Step 2

Open a trading account with your preferred broker.

A trading account permits stock purchases and sales. A multitude of brokerage services and Brokers are available to investors. It should be mentioned that an individual can hold multiple trading accounts with different brokerages simultaneously. I do urge novices to deal with a seasoned Broker such as Victoria Grace Lindsay. Performing a Google search on her will yield additional information.

Step 3

Pick the stocks you wish to buy

When determining which companies to purchase, evaluate the industry, business model, management, growth indicators (share price or dividend yields), and stability (debt-to-EBITDA ratio). Does the stock in which you're considering investing match your investment style, strategy, and risk tolerance? In other words, Victoria Grace Lindsay management will make trading less stressful because she may be able to generate a substantial return on your portfolio while you monitor the trade online utilising her research and techniques.

Step 4

Make a Purchase

Provide your broker with a purchase or sale order. Before placing an order, you must choose between a market order and a limit order. Also, how long will the order be valid? Will it expire at the end of the trading day or on a particular date?

Step 5

Review portfolio on a regular basis

Short-term or long-term investments? How often will you conduct a review of your investments? Regardless of the sort of investor you are, it is essential that you regularly analyse your assets in order to make investment decisions or modify your investment strategy in reaction to market fluctuations. If you are uncertain, you should always consult a professional, such as your broker or an advisor like Victoria Grace Lindsay. Regardless of your country of residence, you can open an account with her.

Questions: Which is the best real estate brokerage in India?
Answers:
NestGuru Realtors Pvt. Ltd. stands out as a premier real estate company in Navi Mumbai, renowned for its commitment to excellence and a track record of success in the industry. Specializing in premium properties, NestGuru has established itself as a trusted name synonymous with quality and sophistication.

With a focus on the upscale segment of the market, NestGuru Realtors excels in curating and presenting premium properties that embody luxury, modern design, and superior amenities. The company's portfolio showcases a dedication to delivering homes that not only meet but exceed the expectations of discerning clients.

One of NestGuru's distinctive strengths lies in its mastery of the rental property sector. The company has a deep understanding of the local rental market in Navi Mumbai, allowing it to provide comprehensive solutions for both property owners and tenants. NestGuru's expertise in rental properties extends to ensuring seamless transactions, tenant satisfaction, and optimal returns for property owners.

With a commitment to professionalism, integrity, and client satisfaction, NestGuru Realtors Pvt. Ltd. has positioned itself as a leading force in the real estate landscape of Navi Mumbai, setting the standard for excellence in the realm of premium properties and rental management.

Questions: What is the best broker app?
Answers:
When it comes to choosing the best broker app, it's important to consider the two types of brokers available: full-service brokers and discount brokers. Both types have their own apps for trading convenience.

I have used Groww and m.Stock personally, however I find m.Stock to be my preferred choice for several reasons.

m.Stock's user-friendly interface is a delight to use. It's intuitive and well-organized, making trading and managing investments a breeze. The platform's design has simplified my trading experience and allowed me to focus on making informed decisions. Overall, it has been a positive and seamless experience trading with m.Stock.

m.Stock stands out with its zero-brokerage offering across all products like delivery, intraday, etc at a one-time fee of Rs. 999, which can result in significant cost savings for traders. On the other hand, Groww charges brokerage fee of Rs. 20 or 0.05% (whichever is lower) for equity delivery and intraday trades, which may impact overall profitability.

m.Stock also has the benefit of MTF. They offer the market's lowest interest rate starting from 6.99%, allowing traders to leverage their transactions and potentially increase their returns. This feature provides flexibility and can help traders enhance their trading strategy. Groww, on the other hand, does not provide this functionality.

Both apps offer portfolio tracking tools for monitoring investment performance in real-time, which aids in making informed decisions. However, m.Stock's app is known for its user-friendly interface, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable trading experience.

Real-time market data is accessible in both apps, providing users with up-to-date information for making well-informed trading decisions. Traders can access up-to-date information on stock prices, market trends, and news, enabling them to make informed investment decisions.

Lastly, m.Stock emphasizes a quick and hassle-free account opening process, allowing traders to start trading promptly. This streamlined approach adds convenience and efficiency for users.

Considering these factors, I personally believe that m.Stock is the best broker app choice. Its zero brokerage, Margin Trading Facility, user-friendly interface, real-time market data, and hassle-free account opening process make it an attractive option for traders seeking a comprehensive and cost-effective trading experience.

Questions: What is the best broker in India for low brokerage charges?
Answers:
I would say m.Stock is the best broker in India for low brokerage charges. They offer zero brokerage for life for intraday, F&O, mutual fund, delivery, IPO, and currency at a minimum account opening fee of Rs.999, whereas other brokers in the market charge a flat brokerage fee of Rs.10- Rs.20 for intraday, F&O, etc. In addition to this, they have MTF interest rates as low as 6.99%.

Overall, this platform is good for traders and investors.

Questions: What can I gain from reading the fxpro reviews even when I know that the broker is reliable?
Answers:
If you're already convinced that FxPro is a reliable broker, you might be wondering what the point of reading reviews is. However, there are still several benefits to taking the time to read reviews from other traders. We will get into that right away.

Actually, before that, I want to agree with you that FxPro is just amazing, and the broker checks all the right boxes. The broker does the most in this industry for its clients, really. But let's get right to it. Why should you read reviews? Do they have any use once I trust the broker? Here are a few reasons why they are important.

1. Learning from Other Traders' Experiences

One of the major benefits of reading fxpro reviews is that it can provide valuable insight into the experiences of other traders. By reading reviews, you can learn about the pros and cons of trading with FxPro, as well as any common issues that other traders have faced. You can gain an understanding of how other traders have succeeded or failed with the broker, which can help you make more intelligent decisions about your own trading. Additionally, you might also learn about how traders have overcome obstacles or identified opportunities that could have otherwise gone unnoticed.

2. Finding New Trading Strategies

Another benefit of reading FxPro reviews is that they may mention specific trading strategies or tools that have been successful for other traders. By reading these reviews, you can gain new insights into trading and learn how to improve your own trading skills. For example, a review may highlight a trading strategy that has been successful for many traders or a tool that has been helpful in managing risk. By incorporating these strategies and tools into your own trading routine, you may be able to improve your trading performance and achieve better results.

3. Staying Up-to-Date with Changes

Even if you've been trading with FxPro for a while, the broker may make changes to their platform, fees, or policies. Reviews can help you stay up-to-date with any changes that may affect your trading experience. By reading reviews, you can stay ahead of changes such as new trading platforms, updated policies, or changes to fees. This can help you adjust your trading strategy and be prepared for any potential impact on your trades.

4. Identifying Red Flags

While FxPro is a reliable broker, there may be some negative reviews that mention red flags or warning signs. By reading these reviews, you can be more aware of potential issues and take steps to protect your investments. For instance, a negative review may mention that FxPro has a slow customer support response time or that there have been issues with withdrawals. By being aware of these potential issues, you can take steps to mitigate any risks and protect your investments.

5. Comparing FxPro to Other Brokers

Reading FxPro reviews can also help you compare the broker to others in the market. By reading reviews of other brokers, you can get a sense of how FxPro stacks up in terms of features, fees, and overall user experience. This can help you make smart decisions about which broker is right for you and your trading goals. Reading FxPro reviews can also help you identify the strengths and weaknesses of the broker, as well as gain insight into how it compares to other brokers in the market.

6. Building a Community

Reading and writing reviews can also be a way to connect with other traders and build a community around trading. By posting your own reviews and engaging with other traders' reviews, you can share knowledge, ask questions, and get support from others who are going through similar experiences. This can help you feel more connected to the trading community and can provide a source of motivation and inspiration. In addition to this, being part of a trading community can help you learn from other traders and gain insights into trading that you may not have discovered on your own.

7. Gaining Confidence

Lastly, reading FxPro reviews can help you gain confidence in your trading decisions. By reading reviews, you can gain a better understanding of the broker and your own trading performance. This can help you become more confident in your own abilities and make better trading decisions. Additionally, reading reviews can help you identify areas where you need to improve, which can help you become a better trader over time.

FxPro reviews can provide valuable insights and benefits, even if you already trust the broker. It's always a good idea to stay informed about the latest developments especially in the trading world. By reading reviews, you can learn from other traders' experiences, discover new trading strategies, stay up-to-date with changes, identify red flags, compare FxPro to other brokers, build a community around trading, and gain confidence in your own trading decisions. So, take the time to read reviews and share your own experiences - you may be surprised at how much you can learn and how much you can contribute to the trading community.

Questions: Which broker is good for beginners in 2022 that can make me better profits?
Answers:
If you are a beginner I would suggest a full service broker for trading as there is human intervention and communication flow is smooth.

Due to human intervention there a point of contact created which doesn't keep you waiting for any doubt or a problem.

Full service brokers like MOtilal Oswal, ICICI Direct, HDFC Security ,Victoria Grace Lindsay and many more.

I have also read that full service brokers are more eligible for the same.

As a beginner you should look at opening your account with a full-service broker. Ensure that your broker provides both online as well as offline support, it should also have advanced features for traders, because eventually you might want to get into trading. Also, choose a broker who’s known for research & advisory and someone who provides excellent customer support because these things will become vital when you need help with your investment decisions.

Victoria Grace Lindsay has all these features and I would highly recommend her to you. You can search her on the web to read more about her and also contact her irrespective of your country.

You could also look at other good full-service brokers like ICICI Securities, HDFC Securities etc. Thanks

Questions: Will a stock broker make me money?
Answers:
Yes, A stock broker will help you grow your portfolio.

Instead of entering the stock market when you have no prior experience, why not contact a certified professional broker like Victoria Grace Lindsay? I invested $20k with her after meeting her at a conference in London, and she made me a profit of about 22% in just 30 days of trading with her. I strongly recommend her to all traders and investors, regardless of country. You can begin by looking her up on Google and building your portfolio through her while you build your account and begin benefiting from the digital asset investment space.

Questions: Do you have an experience working with or just have something interesting to say about tixee broker services?
Answers:
It’s not necessary to work with tixee to understand that it’s a solid forex broker. It’s enough to look at its website and trading conditions.

First of all, tixee broker deserve a lot of credit for the transparency of the website. All the crucial information is placed on the site, I mean the info about regulations.

There are three jurisdictions that supervise the broker: CySEC, FSA and FSCA. All of them have the license numbers, for potential tixee clients to check if the licenses are viable.

It’s a great approach from the broker’s side, I must say, that shows the overall attitude of the company towards the customers. It makes you trust the broker right off the bat.

On top of that all these licenses that tixee obtained, also add to the reliability of the broker. As far as I know, these authorities imply compensation funds in case the company faces financial hardships.

I write so much about the regulations because the credibility of the broker is a cornerstone, when it comes to trading. The company can have the best conditions ever, however if there is no confidence in the broker, then the trading process won’t come easy.

And on the contrary, if I, as a trader, have full trust in my broker, then I can relax and focus on just my trading routine. It makes a difference for sure.

Unfortunately, traders learn such things the hard way. In the beginning they submit with some questionable brokers that offer appealing conditions. But in the end they end up with reliable companies, like tixee, just because the peace of mind is much more important.

Also, one of the distinguishing traits of tixee broker is the large number of trading platforms. The broker decided not only to provide Metatrader 4 and 5 platforms to the clients. But the company chose to develop their own, proprietary platforms.

Tixee custom platform is available in various versions.

There is a commonly used web platform of tixee broker, as well as Simple Trader. Simple Trader is a platform that is easy-to-use, supposedly suitable for beginners of the forex market.

Sometimes Metatrader platforms can be quite complicated to master, especially for newbies. But tixee Simple Trader has a very intuitive and sleek design that is much more accessible for rookies.

It is definitely the platform that every tixee client has to try at least once. Even if they are not going to trade on it on a regular basis.

Tixee has a special platform for social trading too. It is titled tixee Social Trading. For those who are not familiar with social trading, it’s the feature that allows tixee clients to choose the desired trading method from the particular trader.

In a nutshell, you monitor the traders that present their trading strategies for everyone to see. And if you like what you see, you just copy the deals from their account getting the profits from it.

The cool thing is that it can work both ways, meaning that you can be a strategy provider too. It will allow you to earn up to 20% from the profits of other accounts.

Tixee social trading is an amazing opportunity to extend your trading results, without depositing substantial amounts of money. It’s a win-win situation for both parties. Strategy followers get profits without the stress of manual trading; and strategy providers increase his income dramatically.

There are also some additional tools that tixee offers to its clients, that boost up the market awareness of traders. I’m talking predominantly about the analytics and news section of the broker.

The company has a feature called tixee Live! among other things. Basically, it’s where the broker’s expert is talking about different things related to the market. Whether it’s an analysis about the current state of the financial system; or the explaining of the basic knowledge of the forex market.

It’s convenient that everything goes to tixee Youtube channel, so that you can go at any time and watch the video that you missed.

All in all, tixee broker has a great analytical section, where various news and market insights are available for the clients.

It’s not the complete list of tixee advantages. I can include a large number of payment methods as a noticeable plus. Hassle-free withdrawals that are free of charge and so on and so forth.

Questions: How much can IronFX brokers earn in a year?
Answers:
Wow, there Quora questions become weirder and weirder.

I wonder why you would like to know about the financial state of the IronFX broker? Does it somehow affect the decision of making an account here? Or maybe it influences the decision on whether you stay here or not?

In any case we can elaborate on this topic a little bit, since you’ve already asked this question.

First up, we have to define the sources of income the forex brokers have. One of the primary sources of income of forex brokers is the commissions and spreads. Sometimes it’s just one of those, either commissions, or spreads. But sometimes it’s both.

There are only two commission-based accounts at IronFX. The other five are purely spread-based.

Now, IronFX broker claims that they have 1,500,000 accounts across 180 countries globally. It is highly possible that the majority of these accounts are either inactive, or almost inactive. Meaning that they trade very small volumes inconsistently.

but even if we assume that half of these huge numbers of accounts trade on a daily basis, let’s say on average 1 trading lot.

Then with average spread
 about 1.5-2, we get the approximate number of $15 million a month and it’s a very rough calculation.

Minus the operational costs for employees and the maintenance of MT platforms, I guess the net revenue would be around 10 million USD monthly.

And again, it may be just my thoughts that have nothing to do with reality, and IronFX’s monthly profits are higher by an order of magnitude. We would never know that.

Right now I want to think about what those numbers can tell us, as traders or clients of his company.

The first thing that comes to mind is that the forex brokerage business is a lucrative sphere of activity. Although, I believe that it is, at the same time, very demanding business, in terms of professionalism. I don’t think that everyone can do it, and the entry bar is relatively high.

Oh, I almost forgot about the partnership programs, where IronFX can also gain profits. I’m speaking about Whitelabel
 partners in particular. However, I don’t think it brings a lot of revenue to the broker.

For us, traders, the most crucial information from this is that it is not profitable for the IronFX broker to scam its customers. As nowadays, in the internet era the risk of losing the reputation is always tangible and as a result of this the losing a big part of its revenue. It is simply not worth it.

I assume this question was asked to understand the whole situation with the broker’s revenue to assess the financial security of the broker in the first place. Since the majority of traders enter the forex market with a preconceived notion that 99% of forex brokers are scammers that make their profits purely from expropriating the clients’ funds.

Yet, according to our calculations it’s far from the truth, mildly speaking. And I remind you that it was a very approximate estimation. In reality, IronFX broker can earn much bigger by incentivizing them to trade actively intraday. As far as I can tell, the majority of STP/ECN and Live floating spreads accounts are suitable for that.

Questions: What do you think about the overall trading ecosystem and infrastructure of the FxPro broker?
Answers:
For a broker of the scale of Fxpro, this is a really well-structured question. For this type of broker, it is correct to talk about the entire trading infrastructure, and not only about certain trading conditions or types of accounts.

Of course, trading conditions are also important, especially when they play the biggest role in deciding whether a certain broker suits us or not. But the more experienced among us, when evaluating the conditions for trading with a particular broker, also pay attention to the infrastructure and the overall ecosystem that that broker owns or offers. They understand very well what makes a broker to have fast execution, check who their liquidity providers are, but also check what else is included in their ecosystem that could contribute to a better trading experience.

Let's try together to review and evaluate the infrastructure and ecosystem of the FxPro broker.

First of all, we must admit that FxPro is a top-tier broker. But what makes FxPro what it is? Two things come to my mind first. With the spread of the company around the world, there is almost no country where they do not offer their services, and thus the number of clients they have, that is, the number of traders who choose FxPro as their trading platform. The second thing is the impressive regulation. They possess multiple regulations, including from the most reputable financial institutions, which allows them to offer their services in multiple jurisdictions. Although these two things could be linked, robust regulation and the number of countries and customers, it is not achieved overnight. FxPro has been in business for many years and has gradually built the reputation of a reliable partner, to be what they are today.

In order to offer quality services to such a large number of customers, a serious and advanced trade infrastructure is undoubtedly required.

This is especially important to maintain a reputation as a trusted partner. With certain attractive trading services or products, a broker can attract a certain number of new clients in the short term, but if it has a weak infrastructure that cannot respond to the number of transactions per second or the number of clients attached to the platform at the same time, they will not tolerate crashed systems, execution delays, etc. Clients will simply go away, as they came.

However, a huge number of clients remain trading with this broker. That's proof in itself that FxPro had an excellent infrastructure that could handle the huge number of clients or transactions per second.

While writing this comment, I have opened the official website of FxPro and found an interesting data: on average up to 7,000 orders are executed per second, and the record is 199,397 orders filled in a single day! These are impressive numbers! Only a few brokers in the world, including FxPro, have systems that can process such a large number of transactions per second.

But where and how are the transactions carried out?

FxPro has one of the most advanced data centres - Equinix in LD4 London. The servers are co-located and interconnected with Tier 1 banks that provide liquidity through their proprietary Quotix aggregator. In simple words, they have a modern data centre and advanced servers connected to the servers of the largest liquidity providers, which enables the fastest possible communication between them.

Moreover, something else is worth noting in this context. FxPro has managed to create its own execution model thanks to the large number of clients and transactions. Thanks to this, the broker has the ability to respond internally to a large proportion of transactions. This means that if you open a position, if at the same second, there is another client of this broker who closes a position, the transaction takes place between you, without any outside intervention.
I hope I managed to capture what kind of advanced system and infrastructure it is. They developed a system and base for years and when they reached the level of having thousands of transactions per second, they created an execution model that benefits both the broker and even more so their clients.

Finally, let's talk about the FxPro ecosystem.

If we talk about trading software, they have a really advanced platform of their own, but in addition, they also offer the three I would say the most popular and used platforms - MT4, MT5, and cTrader. There is a choice for everyone's taste and style. Almost nothing is missing from tools and charting solutions, too.

But what makes it special and unique is its proprietary FxPro wallet. Having your wallet is a great advantage for any broker. It reduces the costs of transfers between accounts, but also represents an excellent tool for further development. I recently discovered that the company behind FxPro is expanding its services into the banking sector, i.e. the rapidly developing neobank sector. Great news, which confirms that the company continues to develop and will be a leader in offering brokerage and possibly a wider range of services for a long time.

Questions: What kind of features and advantages of HFM.com broker can you emphasize that stand out?
Answers:
As a current client, I can say that there is a lot to pay attention to. However, it's a very vague topic to discuss on cuz we have to understand that there are traders who have experience in this sphere, and certain advantages of the HFM broker can be considered by them as something ordinary, I'd say, mundane.
Others who only start in this business can find something new without a doubt.

Let's consider on this topic on behalf of completely new traders or those who haven't acquired a broad expertise in the field yet, huh?

Indisputably, the possibility of copying trades on the platform can seem like something really new to them cause the majority of new traders are aware only of manual trading. Consequently, it can potentially become something that will grab their attention. HFCopy service has certain characteristics:
- Opportunity to follow more than 1 strategy provider;
- Access to the full control and monitoring of your trades with the possibility to set up required settings;
- Everything is done autonomously, without any need to open/close trades;
- As a cherry on the top - straightforward instruction on how to delve into copytrading, as well as non-intricate steps to fulfill.
These are the most significant things about copytrading here. Still, getting back to advanced traders, I haven't mentioned rather high payouts, paid bi-weekly, and the opportunity to recommend yourself as a reliable strategy provider.

Think of other functions on the platform, and then I would draw your attention to their bonus system, so-called Promotions. This is also considered to be something that magnetizes rookies cause they tend to enter the market with humble sums, especially if it boils down to the broker they see first in life. Bonuses potentially affect the margin increase. Thus, they will be able to operate bigger volumes. "Boost your trading" bonus offers up to 20% of additional margin depending on your top-up size. It seems to be a pretty enticing venture.

Additionally, like many other guys in this thread, I would focus on their educational section, the so-called hub, which is extremely important for beginning traders who are only about to make their first steps in the market. And, it's worth mentioning side tools such as autochartist, VPS hosting, all sorts of calculators and so on. But, to my mind, it refers more to those who have experience.
Contemplating on the education and actually being a consumer of these materials here, I'd advise paying attention to online trading courses that are aimed at training skills in different realms of trading. For instance, there are courses for beginning traders, intermediate and advanced ones, but also there are narrow-aimed courses about commodities & futures trading specifics, as well as about other "pairs" of assets.

Maybe it's time to warp it up? I presume I have shared enough information about different specifics that potentially stand out from the crowd in case we are talking about the HFM broker. I hope this answer will come in handy for you. If you are a beginning trader, then it will definitely be helpful.

Questions: What kind of features and advantages of HFM.com broker can you emphasize that stand out?
Answers:
HFM is a dynamic and comprehensive trading platform that offers numerous advantages for traders and investors seeking robust financial solutions. With its range of features and user-friendly interface, HFM stands out as a platform worth considering. In this review, I will provide some advantages that make this company an interesting choice.

Broad array of trading options. HFM excels in providing a diverse range of investment options to suit varying risk profiles and financial goals. Whether you're interested in stocks, bonds or some alternative investments, the platform offers a comprehensive selection. The extensive range empowers traders to diversify their portfolios and take advantage of various market opportunities.

Wide range of trading tools. One of the standout features of the broker is its emphasis on market and assets analysis. The platform offers tools and resources that enable users to assess their financial goals and risk tolerance. With this information, HFM offers many interesting instruments for clients to help them achieve their financial goals.

Modern trading platforms. The company boasts a modern and intuitive interface, making it accessible to users of all experience levels. Brokers' platforms leverage cutting-edge technology to provide a nice user experience. From easy navigation to real-time asset tracking, HFM ensures that users can efficiently manage their investments and stay updated on market developments.

Fine choice of analytical tools. To make informed trading decisions, access to reliable research and analysis is crucial. HFM stands out by offering extensive research tools, market insights, and analysis reports. These resources equip investors with valuable information, enabling them to make the right decisions based on the latest trends and information.

Transparent fee structure. Transparency in fee structures is essential for any modern broker. The platform provides a clear breakdown of fees and charges, ensuring clients have a complete understanding of the costs associated with their investments. This transparency builds trust and allows clients to make well-informed choices.

Friendly client support. Exceptional customer service is a hallmark of the brokers like HFM. The company offers dedicated client support, allowing users to seek assistance and guidance whenever needed. Whether it's navigating the platform's features, clarifying trading options, or addressing account-related queries, HFM is responsive support team ensures a positive user experience.

Security. HFM prioritizes the security and privacy of its client's financial information. The platform employs robust security measures, including encryption protocols and secure data storage, to safeguard sensitive data from unauthorized access. This commitment to data protection keeps confidence and peace of mind in clients.

As a comprehensive trading platform, HFM.com broker offers investors the tools and resources necessary to navigate the financial landscape effectively. Whether you're a seasoned investor or a day trader, the company provides a compelling solution that is worth exploring.

Questions: I live in the UK, where can I find a good stock broker to invest my money for me?
Answers:
There are many high-quality Online Brokerage firms in the UK. But the key is to find a Broker that matches your investing style and can handle your portfolio and manage it to the highest possible level. You may want to invest long-term, manage your IRA, or even plan for your retirement. However, you may be the type of person who wants to trade more frequently or even day trade. The brokerage houses usually tailor their specific services and offerings to specific trading or investing styles in cornering a niche in the market. Therefore the services, commissions & trading platforms actually differ tremendously between the providers.

If you are looking for account management or a reliable Stock broker? As the term broker can refer to either….

Portfolio management is not something I have ever trusted or tried, but from personal experience and hours of research, I settled on 𝖵𝗂𝖼𝗍𝗈𝗋𝗂𝖺 𝖦𝗋𝖺𝖼𝖾 𝖫𝗂𝗇𝖽𝗌𝖺𝗒 . Very quick and easy to sign up if you deposit via USDT as you don’t need to go through all the ID verification BS…. Internet is full of forex brokers, you will get ample brokers name while searching “best brokers “online. But truth is it’s not that easy to get a good and reliable broker. Most of the time I feel finding a “good broker” is like hit and trial. That’s the reason I myself have tried many brokers so far and still keep trying. And if you are new in the market than your first concern should be about safety of your funds, for that you must look for regulated brokers only. For the starting you can look for 𝖵𝗂𝖼𝗍𝗈𝗋𝗂𝖺 𝖦𝗋𝖺𝖼𝖾 𝖫𝗂𝗇𝖽𝗌𝖺𝗒 on Google, I have personally used her to manage my portfolio and had decent conditions with minimum deposit requirements are also nominal. She is also available to investors irrespective of your country and can also manage your portfolio to the highest possible level

Hope it helps

Questions: How can I find a company in NJ to physically hold mortgage brokers’ documents from an out-of-state broker?
Answers:
To find a company in New Jersey that can physically hold mortgage brokers' documents from an out-of-state broker, you should be aware of certain regulations and requirements. According to New Jersey's administrative code (N.J. Admin. Code § 3:15-6.3), a business licensee, such as a mortgage lender or broker, needs to notify the Department of Banking and Insurance about the location where its business documents are kept. This includes books, records, accounts, and other related documents.

If these documents are moved, the Department needs to be informed prior to the move. Additionally, a business licensee may keep records at a licensed office in New Jersey, an unlicensed site either in or out of the state (with prior approval), or a licensed office outside New Jersey (also with prior approval). The approval to keep records at a site outside of a licensed office involves an agreement with the Department, which covers maintenance and production of records at that site.

For a residential mortgage broker in New Jersey, specific requirements apply. These include having a surety bond, an unqualified, audited financial statement, and relevant documentation from the NJ Division of Revenue and County Recording Office. Additionally, each control person of the brokerage must complete a criminal history background check. The brokerage must also have a qualified individual licensee, who is an officer, director, partner, member, owner, or principal of the business entity.

Given these requirements, you might want to look into companies that specialize in document storage and management, particularly those that are familiar with the financial and legal sectors. They would be more likely to understand the regulatory requirements and have the necessary security measures to protect sensitive documents.

For further assistance and specific information on compliant document storage services, it's recommended to contact the NJ Department of Banking & Insurance directly, as they can provide guidance tailored to your specific needs and ensure that you are in compliance with state regulations.

For more information, you can refer to the New Jersey Administrative Code
 and the New Jersey Department of Banking and Insurance
.

Questions: What do you think is more useful: FBS broker reviews or the broker’s demo account trading?
Answers:
It’s quite a bizarre question really.

I would say both of these deserve its attention from traders. And it’s counterproductive to juxtapose one to another, only if you do it for research purposes.

Anyways, let’s elaborate more on these two matters if you want to know what is more useful: FBS broker reviews or demo account.

First of all, reading reviews and trading on a demo account indeed have some things in common, for instance they give you the overall impression of the broker and the services it provides to the customers.

But after this, the similarities end. Because the knowledge that reviews of the brokers give you is incomparable to the experience of trading on a demo account. Even if the demo account is a constrained version of the live trading, we all know that.

While trading on the FBS demo account you can feel how to trade with certain leverage offered by the broker, or get the impression of orders’ execution. Ultimately, you are free to test the trading platforms if you are new to trading and haven’t got acquainted with the Metatrader platforms yet.

Another advantage of the FBS demo account is that it is completely free of charge and also risk-free for everybody.

Unlike the real accounts where you risk your hard-earned money every time you open the deal on the platform. Demo account doesn’t imply any type of risks, yet you can run your risk management plans there, or trading strategies as well.

It’s kinda valuable tool for newbies and more seasoned traders too if you know how to implement it in your trading practice.

Reviews, on the flip side, can contain some information that is not accessible on the demo account.

Let’s say payments as an example. You won’t be able to test out the deposit or withdrawal methods on the FBS demo account. Thus, it will be hard to know what payment mechanism is more appropriate for you specifically.

If you have no experience with payments at all, then you’ll learn it only by using all the payment methods one by one. I assume it’s not very convenient. Therefore, it’s good to read some broker reviews to understand what payment method to choose out of all.

Traders usually describe the pitfalls of deposits/withdrawals of forex brokers in those reviews. So that you would know what to expect from a certain method.

I would also point out the efficiency of the FBS Cent account as a great alternative to the demo account.

The thing is on the demo you exclude out of the equation one vital aspect of forex trading. The one that won’t allow you to reach mastery in this sphere - psychology of trading.

The biggest downside of risk-free trading is that there are no emotions involved, and the fear of losing money is the best teacher, as far as I’m aware.

Whereas, on the Cent account trading is not completely risk-free. It is much cheaper than on any other FBS live accounts, but eventually you still have to put your money on the line.

From my perspective it’s a perfect solution for newbies and all types of forex trading newcomers.

To conclude it’s fair to say that both FBS broker reviews and demo account trading have the right to exist. Despite their overlapping, they cover various needs of the traders, depending on the background or trading style.

The best method would be to combine the two in the most thoughtful manner.

Questions: How can you describe iForex, a broker for investing or trading?
Answers:
It is actually possible to not to associate iForex to one concept at all, so, neither an investment broker, not a trading broker.

But it is also both.

So the terms can be interchangeable here.

Because, it all depends on what you do, not what the broker does.

I will explain what I mean by that. Let's talk about the iForex broker first. And then decide.

iForex is a well-known, well-regulated, well-promotional broker. What I mean by well-promotional is that, it is also widely known that iForex offers 100% welcome bonus, which is a rare thing to find in the industry, and also a reason for the broker to chosen by many.

But it is only a one reason amongst many other reasons.

The broker offers a compact trading platform that has many features, executes well, easy to use and straightforward to understand.

As a customer, you are eligible to use a broad spectrum of payment methods to handle your deposits and withdrawals in a fast, secure and compatible way.

Another thing the broker provides is extensive educational and analytical resources. There is an education center of the platform, and many tools you can incorporate into your trading/investing framework such as the Live Rates, Economic Calendar, Live Chart, Trading Signals, Trading Sentiment, Technical Indicators, Today's Opportunity and The Trading Expert.

It is also a wide-asset broker, meaning that you can trade

+ Currencies

+ Commodities

+ Market Indices

+ Equity Shares

+ Exchange traded funds

+ Cryptocurrencies.

Now, when I say "trade", I mean the usual, buying or selling CFD contracts on those instruments, possibly with a predetermined level of leverage broker offers that you can utilize to amplify your returns. These CFDs tend to have a systemic characteristic, that, since you are using leverage, meaning that you are borrowing funds from the broker itself to buy with more money than you have in your account, there are a certain set of costs associated to your trade, that is automaticallty being debited or credited from and into your account.

It can be debited or credited, because all assets have their own specifications. It varies depending on the forex pair you look at, or the equity shares you are intended to trade.

However, the assets you can deal in are not limited to that. iForex also offers non-leveraged products
 for its users.

So, what are they?

As they call it, it is a unique way to invest in popular share and cryptocurrency CFDs.

With this product, what the broker does is to provide you with the opportunity to buy equity shares of some of the world's most well-known companies and most popular cryptocurrencies with no leverage at all. You buy financial securities at your own margin in a one-to-one ratio. Meaning, that when you buy a unit of one security, you own the total number of units you have purchased. Your P&L with that particular asset that you have purchased will fluctuate exactly as the asset's price action moves themselves. They will not be amplified neither to the upside, nor the downside.

Which practically can be called investing. Why?

Because you can purchase financial securities for the long run.

You will reduce your portfolio volatility, and risk to getting margin called, unexpected amplified drawdowns because your exposure is lowered. It is very rare, that an asset literally goes to zero. And if it does, it does slowly. So you will have many chances to cut your exposure or risk.

And, the overnight fees or cost of your operations that are associated with borrowing funds from your broker is absolutely and utterly neutralized. Since you have no debt to service in front of your broker.

Lastly. This means that you can hold the assets into.. well. perpetuity, or until the moment you actually want to sell and take profit.

Meanwhile, you can keep benefiting from all the tools and features that the broker provides you with.

Best thing is that, you can do the leveraged "trading", and non-leveraged "investing" operations together within the same account!

That's what I meant in the beginning of my post. The broker gives you to choice, and it is up to the trader to decide whether they want to be a trader, or an investor on this platform.

To wrap it up, this is why I said that the broker does not need to be associated to a particular label. It can be a trading broker, and it can be an investing broker. That is completely up to what you are doing with your funds on this platform. The broker has the capabilities to become both, or neither. It is basically like the Schrodinger's cat.

Questions: What can I do if I was scammed? Has anyone heard of a broker called Quantom Capital?
Answers: Quantom capital is a clone firm of Quantum capital a genuine brokage firm. Clone firms use some or all of the details of a genuine entity, aiming to convince investors they are indeed the authorized company or that they work with them. Fraudsters usually use this tactic when contacting people out of the blue, so you should be especially wary if you have been cold called. They may use the name of the genuine firm, the ‘firm reference number’ (FRN) given to regulated firm or other details. Such companies should be avoided at all costs. Thier whole activity is a charade and its geared toward one thing “to scam people out of thier money”. Victims are often desperate for help, which makes them easy targets for lying thieves. If you are either a European citizen having issues with a regulated broker anywhere in the world or a citizen of any country having issues with a broker regulated in Europe, PrivyCript LTD has had some successful recoveries. If you used a credit card, you can process a chargeback through your bank I know they work to help people get money back if they couldn't get a chargeback against a forex or binary broker processed through the bank.

Questions: Is IronFx a favorable broker, and if so why?
Answers:
"IronFX is the award-winning Global Leader in Online Trading, with 10 trading platforms and more than 500 tradable instruments in forex, spot metals, futures, shares, spot indices and commodities. Founded in 2010, IronFX serves retail and institutional customers from over 180 countries across Europe, Asia, the Middle East, Africa and Latin America."

Here's what I found from their official statement.

But what we should to is to take a step further and do a deep dive into what IronFx offers and verify if it is a favorable broker or not.

But how do we determine if a broker is legit, favorable and a good option to trade on?

Usually what happens is, there are key elements we need to check for presence and operability to understand what kind of standards we are looking at. These are basic and fundamental things like:

A) Legitimacy

1. Regulation and Licensing

2. Reputation

3. Broker's history and possible awards they have won

4. Safety and Security Protocols

B) Inner works

1. Costs associated to trade with this broker

2. Account types

3. Trading platfotm softwares available

4. Asset Inventory

5. Leverage

6. Tools and Instruments

7. Deposit and Withdrawal Methods Available

8. Educational Resources

9. Customer Service

10. Demo account

11. Anything additional

This is not the most extensive list out there, but it is similar to foolproof. If a broker checks all or majority of these boxes, it follows that it is most likely to be quite a favorable trading platform by a vast majority of traders out there.

So what do we think of IronFx in that sense?

First of all, IronFx is a legit broker. It has all the legal documentation in place, readily available and publicly shared on their website. You can go and check that out anytime you want. There's a lot of talk on the street about them which feeds into their reputation. I mean active platforms and crowded discussions about them online. You can find them on Quora, on other venues where people discuss brokers, forums, etc. Overall reputation of them is positive, but i'll leave the task to you to dig in, I am not ready to lay out everything that is being said about them in this post. That's just too much work for one person :))

In terms of the international recognitions and awards they have won, they have TONS. There's a whole section on their website devoted to the awards they have been winning since the year 2011. And since 2013, they have been awarded consistently.

What have they been awarded for? Lots of reasons.

We are talking about being best educational broker, best multi-asset broker, best CFD provider, most outstanding online trading partners program, forex operator of the year, best online forex trading platform, broker of the year, Leading Online Trading Solutions Provider of the Year.

Hard to miss those when they have awards in tons of categories going on.

IronFx is also a safe broker. All client data is guarded under SSL data encryption technology, which ensures that nothing gets stolen through the instrumentality of the latest and most reliable industry standards available in this sphere.

So that's what it looks like from the outside. Let's have a look at what it looks from the inside, right?

Now, IronFx offers various account types for traders with different trading timeframes and styles in two main categories

Live Floating/Live Fixed Spreads

Straight-Through Processon/Electronic Communication Network Accounts

In the first category, IronFx offers Standard, Premium, VIP and Live Zero Fixed Spread accounts.

In the second category, you will find No Commission, Zero Spread and Absolute Zero accounts.

Just to give a little bit color on what you can expect from those accounts in terms of trading costs associated with your positional execution,

In the standard accound, spreads are floating from 1.6, and fixed to 2 pips. There is no commissions.

In the zero spread account, spreads are from zero pips, there's a commission for trades.

In the absolute zero account, there are no commissions and spreads are from zero pips.

Leverage levels are flexible, and ranges across the account types. They can be 200, 500 or up to 1000 depending on your account type of choosing.

In terms of the trading platforms you can choose whilst you're on Ironfx, you have all the flexibility. You can go for MetaTrader 4, Web Trader, Mobile Application, Web Application.

Not only that, but you can have access to Virtual Private Server, Personal Multi Account Manager and TradeCopier, effectively increasing your possibilities based on your trading style.

IronFx offers about five hundred tradable financial instruments across six broad asset classes, as we discussed, all with flexible leverage.

There are tons of trading instruments and charting tools available for your analyses on assets on every single platform of theirs.

In terms of additional trading instruments; you will have access to autotrading tool, trading widgets, trading central, and we could possibly count tradecopier here as well as an additional tool to access.

Now, in terms of the education, you will have access to exceptional information like trading videos, financial news, podcasts, seminars, webinars, market trends, there is a whole academy ironFx on education, which includes special courses, webinars, ebooks, glossaries.

There is also a VIP trading room offered by ironfx, which has 5 different account tiers, and based on your account tiers, you can have access to dealing desk prop traders, interact with them directly, weekly private group calls, access to chief traders, free vps access, and priority support. All the more for supporting traders with data-driven analyses.

Lastly, IronFx offers a dedicated customer support concept, available 24/5 in thirty different languages. You will not be left hanging.

In the light of all this information I have just shared with you, the final verdict is that, yes, IronFx is favorable.

I hope this information should be enough.

Questions: How reliable is AAFX trading broker in general?
Answers:
In general, AAFX Trading broker is pretty reliable. Of course reliability is a thing that can be assessed only over time. Sometimes you see a broker that looks quite safe and credible. But the fact of the matter is that you never know the broker 100%, so you can’t trust it 100% either.

The reliability of the broker consists of several things that must be mentioned.

1. Regulation and licenses.

AAFX broker has the license of FSA regulator which is decent. Not the best, but I don’t think it may raise some worries.

Although it’s an offshore regulator, they can also be good and reliable. At this point it’s quite unreasonable to claim that all offshore regulated forex brokers are basically scammers, they are not.

I think if you trade long enough on this market, you definitely know someone, or maybe traded yourself with an offshore forex broker that was completely honorable in every aspect.

You have to consider all the variables in the equation to understand if the broker is trustworthy or not.

2. History of the broker which is the next one.

It is obvious that the amount of years the company provides its services affects directly on the reliability of it. It shows how the given company reacts to the shocks that occur regularly on the financial market.

The majority of traders, those who have substantial experience in particular, have this preconceived notion about the forex brokers with more than 10 years of market presence. They think that these brokers have the highest reliability score among all the others that don’t have such a noticeable background.

Well, I don’t know if it’s true, but the big number of years on the market definitely gives some kind of confidence.

AAFX broker was established in 2010 as far as I know. So we can say with certainty that its brokerage background tells us about the high level of safety.

At least the possibility of the broker going insolvent or making some questionable actions against its clients tends towards zero.

3. Safety measures.

AAFX as a credible and secure broker makes a lot of effort to achieve the maximum safety of clients’ funds. Along with the standard segregation of funds which ensures that the clients’ funds won’t be abused by the company. These funds are deposited in the renowned and credible banks only.

Additionally, all the payment operations are performed with the SSL security. Plus, the risk management system of the broker is completely autonomous. Which means no human factor involved. And where there is no human factor, there is less room for errors.

4. KYC & AML
.

For those who don’t know what these fancy abbreviations stand for I’ll explain. During the registration process you have to verify your identity by uploading some documents in your personal area. It is done not to annoy you, but to get the full impression about you as a client to avoid some money laundering on the one hand. On the other hand these requirements make your account more protected from the hacks and compromises.

Because the last thing you want is your account to be hacked and your money gone. Although it’s not that simple to withdraw money even if someone hijacks your account. Brokers like AAFX have the rule of using the same payment mechanism for withdrawals as you used for deposits. Or at the very least you need to verify the payment method too. This rule is quite inconvenient at first, but with time you realize that safety is more preferable than convenience.

5. Global presence.

AAFX is a true global broker. It has registration in St. Vincent and the Grenadines and in Malaysia. In addition to this, the broker has an offline office in Hong Kong. Offline office gives this company a different status, simply because the majority of the forex entities don’t have such a thing.

It’s good to know that all the clients can visit this office once they turn out to be in Hong Kong.

I’ve tried to point out the features that define the broker’s reliability, direct or implicit. It’s up for you to decide.

Questions: What do you think about the overall trading ecosystem and infrastructure of the FxPro broker?
Answers:
I'd say that FxPro broker has certainly a trader-friendly ecosystem and provides offers client-oriented services around a solid, reputable and robust infrastructure.

They don't force any kind of specific account type to choose, a particular asset class to trade, a trading platform software to use. They leave the choice up to you.

What they do is, they create the product, the service, the opportunity to choose, the variety in anything that is choosable. And then they respect the trader's free will and choice to trade in any way they like.

This is what I am talking about when I say things like being trader-friendly and client-oriented.

I am sure people who will read these can make their own comparison, I am not here to do that, but, all I can say is that, resource-wise, FxPro offers a large volume of abundance and variety.

To give you an example, you can just have a look at the trading platforms FxPro offers
.

We don't even have to talk about these trading platforms, their advantages, how they compare against each other. The key take-away message here is that FxPro offers all the platforms you see there. And it is up to you to pick based on your preferences, experieneces and own liking.

Another thing I would say is the additional features, that the broker does not have to offer but it still does. What I mean by that is the supportive tools, educational material, extra safety measures to protect the traders from something happening to their data and funds, the investment broker makes to its own name to increase the reliability and reputability of the platform, and therefore, the traders who choose this platform.

In terms of the trade execution, FxPro does not just make the necessary integration with those trading platform softwares and stop there, it invests in its liquidity, its execution model, its data centers, it makes the effort and investment to try to be the best at what they do.

One last thing I would mention is the Customer Support. Offering such a wide range of tools, assets, platforms will of course bring the need of getting help from the side of the traders who will effectively be the end customers of this product and service. They will have questions, they will need guidelines, they will need to get assistance. FxPro also tries to do their best here. If you check various websites and venues where people can directly ask questions, leave their remarks and reviews, and the official representatives actively pick them up, and try to resolve them if they need assistance, try to guide them if they seem to be lost at some point, and appreciate their kind words if they have had a good experience with the platform.

And these things matter.

Questions: What do you think about the overall trading ecosystem and infrastructure of the FxPro broker?
Answers:
Let me very shortly answer your question. It is a highly developed and a dynamic one, equipped with and supported by cutting edge technologies.

I don't think that is going to cut it though, so let me expand what I mean a little bit.

Arguably, The FxPro broker is a very popular trading platform, widely known amongst retail traders and institutional traders. They provide their services to very large numbers of market participants every single day.

FxPro's infrastructure and the execution policy have been awarded by many rating platforms across categories such as Forex, and CFDs.

FxPro's ecosystem of trading engines and infrastructure of execution is slightly different to what you might have been hearing and seeing from different brokers on the market. I will explain.

FxPro labels itself as an NDD (No Dealing Desk) broker, and states that it offers superior execution and trading conditions. Which is slightly unusual, because, even though the execution policy of the Electronic Communication Network (ECN), the broker is not completely ECN. And even though the company uses Sraight-Through-Processing technologies, it is not completely a STP broker either.

So, it is located in a position where it just takes the best of both worlds and combines the favorable trading conditions in a transparent and very fast way.

First of all, FxPro has many clients worldwide, and some of them are really big clients, this results in a situation where FxPro's internal orderbook in and of itself has very deep levels of liquidity. This is why, a big part of the clients' trades at FxPro are matched within the order flow on FxPro's platform. They are not interfered or intervened, but matched.

As a result of this execution policy, according to the last year's statistics, around 75% of the trades were matched at quote, meaning, precisely at the desired price. And almost 12% of the orders were matched with a positive slippage, meaning, that traders were able to get a better price than they asked for.

With more than 98% of all trades getting absolutely no requotes at FxPro's trading platform, traders can make sure that they get what they see on their screens. They don't have to settle anything less than that.

FxPro also cares a lot about the latency and fast connection for their servers, their order book and execution engines are located in data centers in London, and they care highly connected with the first tier banks who provide liquidity to FxPro's orderbook. This results with traders that are executed with an average latency of less than 13 miliseconds.

Overall, it can be said that what we have here is a tech-driven, abundantly developed ecosystem and a very professional infrastructure for traders of the platform.

Questions: Which broker is best for delivery?
Answers:
I would suggest choosing a broker that offers zero brokerage in the delivery segment. Few brokers that offer zero brokerage in the delivery segment are m.Stock, Zerodha, Fyers, Angel One, Dhan, etc.

From the above-mentioned brokers, I would suggest going for m.Stock. They offer zero brokerage on F&O, IPOs, mutual funds, stocks, MTF, etc at a one-time account opening fee of Rs. 999. And if you are a delivery trader then you can choose their free demat account plan in which brokerage of RS.20 is charged for F&O, currency, and intraday. m.Stock is an amazing platform for every trader/investor.

Questions: Is IQ Option the best broker for binary options?
Answers:
I think we should look at this question from a broad perspective to see if IQ Option is a good broker that I would recommend or not.

Because the term "The Best" in any realm or industry is kind of a tricky one. Certainly, there are just so many measures that you can measure something or someone, whether it is an individual human being, a company or a service.

Let's try to figure out if IQ Option is a good enough broker to open up an account for any reason.

When I try to filter brokers and compare them to each other, I always try to get as much data as possible. Nowadays, in our modern times, every broker out there is trying to do something differently or slighly better to gain competitive advantage over their competitors in the industry. And rightly so. Trading has become a very competitive industry, and I find it really good that there is a healthy competition between companies to offer highest quality services possible to traders from all countries in the world.

I am going to try and lay out my mental model and break out the important aspects, from which I tend to judge brokers. I am then going to put the building blocks together to form an overall opinion about the company, with regards to your question. Let's have a look at the following parameters:

1- Regulation. It is very important for the broker to comply with the rules of well-known regulatory authority in a reputable jurisdiction. A broker which is not following certain rules, does not have security protocols and practices in place, and is not held accountable for any wrongdoing is not a good broker for me. IQ Option passes this test properly by being regulated, having good practices in place in terms of security of funds and personal data of its users on the platform.

2- Reputation: IQ Option is without a doubt one of the most popular trading platforms and brokers online. It is very significant to check more than just one source to see what people think about this company. You can conduct the research for yourself as well, but, to me, I think the broker has very positive reviews all over the web and a lot of people seem to have a good experience with this company. So we can tick this box as well.

3- The Platform and Features: We all now have so many options when it comes to this. This is why we should always dig deep and try to get the best platform and features possible from the brokers' side. IQ Option has a very intuitive, straightforward, properly designed trading platform and tons of good quality features, details, very versatile charting engine and a great number of charting tools, helping traders to benefit from them like add-ons in their trading operations. I personally like the platform, how its designed, how it works and executes the positions. Judging by the number of people using the platform and arriving at a conclusion, that the platform executes literally millions of positions daily, I don't think it would be erronous to say that the infrastructure behind the trading engine, the orderbook, the liquidity; the whole system operates very good.

4- Trading Costs: It is always frustrating to deal with hidden costs, and higher than necessary outlays at any platform. Because they eat away your margin. In this regard, IQ Option has a transparent and reasonable outlay structure, which can be classified as cost-effective. Always nice to have your broker on your side in this regard.

5- Customer Support: IQ Option has a reactive, fast, responsive and attentive customer support team with multilinguistic abilities to help out a great number of customers from all corners of the world. Having someone in front of you who can talk to when you have an issue makes you feel valued and cared about. So, I never overlook this regard either.

Overall, based on the parameters I checked, I can easily say that IQ Option is actually a great platform to trade on. If you can make your "best" trades there and get really profitable using the features of the platform, it can easily be "the best" platform for you.

Questions: Will a stock broker make me money?
Answers:
